title: Security Awareness Gamification
description: A manager wants to increase engagement with the security awareness program by implementing gamification.

tasks.description: Design a points system where employees earn points for completing training, reporting real phishing emails, and passing phishing simulations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager designs a clear and motivating points system.

tasks.description: Create a public leaderboard that shows the top-scoring employees and departments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully implements the leaderboard to foster competition.

tasks.description: Arrange for small prizes or recognition for the quarterly winners.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully adds an incentive layer to the program, increasing participation.
